name: Cube On The Floor
description:
Game maked by: Token (or by me).

How to play:

  • To movement use: W A S D or Arrows.
  • Use the mouse to click on the buttons.

I made this game following the video lessons, though i added my changes to the game. I just wanted to add this game to Itch.io, and as you can see, i'm added this game to itch.io.

If you want to contact me or you have any ideas, which you would like to share, you can go to a post in the community called Issues, and leave a comment there.

Thanks you for playing!
